member.name: F:Moqikaka.Util.StringFilter.SpecialCharFilter.specialCharData
member.summary: 所有待处理的特殊字符

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.StringFilter.SpecialCharFilter.Utf16FromUnicode(System.UInt32)
member.remarks: unicode转utf-16计算公式: 参考地址:https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-16 如果unicode值小于等于0xFFFF(基本多语言平面的码位范围),则直接取此值作为编码值(16位) 如果unicode值大于0xFFFF,则按照下列步骤计算出32位编码值 码位减去0x10000,得到的值的范围为20比特长的0..0xFFFFF 高位的10比特的值（值的范围为0..0x3FF）被加上0xD800得到第一个码元或称作高位代理（high surrogate） 低位的10比特的值（值的范围也是0..0x3FF）被加上0xDC00得到第二个码元或称作低位代理（low surrogate）

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.StringFilter.SpecialCharFilter.UnicodeFromUtf16(System.UInt16,System.UInt16)
member.remarks: unicode编码方式： 参考地址:https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-16 4bit位(作为码位平面 plane) + 16bit位（作为平面内的码位） 前4bit全为0时，称作基本多语言平面，大部分都在此列 基本多语言平面内，从U+D800到U+DFFF之间的码位区块是永久保留不映射到任何字符（utf-16则以此进行编码）

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.StringFilter.SpecialCharFilter.AddEmojiChar
member.remarks: 表情字符大全参考： https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%B9%AA%E6%96%87%E5%AD%97 对应unicode版本号：Unicode 10.0版本

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.StringFilter.SpecialCharFilter.WriteAllSpecialCharToFile(System.String)
member.summary: 把所有需要过滤的字符写入到文件

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.StringFilter.SpecialCharFilter.IfHaveSpecialChar(System.String)
member.summary: 检查是否含有特殊字符 1. ascii控制字符 2. \ " ' 3. 所有emoji字符

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.StringFilter.SpecialCharFilter.IfInSupplementaryPlane(System.UInt16,System.UInt16)
member.summary: 检查某个utf-16的编码对是否是辅助平面编码
member.returns: true：是处于辅助平面的码位 false:不是

member.param: 账户类型(1:手Q;2:微信;3:游客;4:h5游戏)
正式服or测试服（1：正式服；2：测试服）
玩家ID,从手Q登录态或微信登录态中获取的openid的值
offerid,offerid即支付结算页面里的应用id
手Q登陆时传手Q登陆回调里获取的paytoken值，微信登陆时传微信登陆回调里获取的传access_token值（注：需要跟客户端获取到的同步）
平台来源，登录获取的pf值（注：需要跟客户端获取到的同步）
登录获取的pfkey值（注：需要跟客户端获取到的同步）

member.name: T:Moqikaka.Util.Security.RSAUtil

member.summary: RSA的容器 可以解密的源字符串长度为 DWKEYSIZE/8-11

member.summary: 检查明文的有效性 DWKEYSIZE/8-11 长度之内为有效 中英文都算一个字符

member.returns: 加密遇到错误将会返回原字符串

member.returns: 遇到解密失败将会返回原字符串

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.Security.RSAUtil.GetRsaParameters_Google(System.String)
member.summary: 将公钥转换为RSA参数 It's important to know that the RSAPublicKey is encoded in an ASN.1 (Abstract Syntax Notation One) representation using DER encoding. I had to use a couple articles on Wikipedia to understand ASN.1 and then I manually decoded the public key to determine where the modulus and exponent were located within the 2048 bit public key from Google.

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.Security.RSAUtil.VerifySignature_Google(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 验证签名是否正确 当前只有google使用的是PKCS #1 version 1.5的签名

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.StringUtil.IfHaveSpecialChar(System.String)
member.summary: 检查字符串是否含有特殊字符 1. 由于utf8-general-ci只能保存U+0000到U+FFFF的字符，所以大于此范围的字符均算特殊字符 2. ascii控制字符 3. \ " '
member.returns: true:包含特殊字符 false:不包含

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.StringUtil.ReplaceSpecialChar(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 替换字符串中的特殊字符 1. 由于utf8-general-ci只能保存U+0000到U+FFFF的字符，所以大于此范围的字符均算特殊字符 2. ascii控制字符 3. \ " '
member.returns: 替换了特殊字符后的字符串

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.Zlib.SupportClass.ReadInput(System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a number of characters from the current source Stream and writes the data to the target array at the specified index.
member.param: The source Stream to read from.
Contains the array of characteres read from the source Stream.
The starting index of the target array.
The maximum number of characters to read from the source Stream.
member.returns: The number of characters read. The number will be less than or equal to count depending on the data available in the source Stream. Returns -1 if the end of the stream is reached.

member.name: M:Moqikaka.Util.Zlib.SupportClass.ReadInput(System.IO.TextReader,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a number of characters from the current source TextReader and writes the data to the target array at the specified index.
member.param: The source TextReader to read from
Contains the array of characteres read from the source TextReader.
The starting index of the target array.
The maximum number of characters to read from the source TextReader.
member.returns: The number of characters read. The number will be less than or equal to count depending on the data available in the source TextReader. Returns -1 if the end of the stream is reached.
